rukus.text: 44|1|haî€¼aa meem.
44|2|shapath hai is khulee pustak kee.
44|3|hamane hee utaara hai ise[1] ek shubh raatri mein. vaastav mein, ham saavadhaan karane vaale hain.
44|4|usee (raatri) mein nirnay kiya jaata hai, pratyek sudrdh karm ka.
44|5|ye (aadesh) hamaare paas se hai. ham hee bhejane vaale hain, rasoolon ko.
44|6|aapake paalanahaar kee daya se, vaastav mein, vah sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai.
44|7|jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar hai tatha jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, yadi tum vishvaas karane vaale ho.
44|8|nahin hai koee vandaneey, parantu vahee, jo jeevan deta tatha maarata hai. tumhaara paalanahaar tatha tumhaare guzare hue poorvajon ka paalanahaar hai.
44|9|balki, ve (mushrik) sandeh mein khel rahe hain.
44|10|to aap prateeksha karen, us din ka, jab aakaash khula dhoonva[1] laayega.
44|11|jo chha jaayega sab logon par. yahee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai.
44|12|(ve kahengeh) hamaare paalanahaar! hamase yaatana door kar de. nishchay ham eemaan laane vaale hain.
44|13|aur unake lie shiksha ka samay kahaan rah gaya? jabaki unake paas aa gaye ek rasool (saty ko) ujaagar karane vaale.
44|14|phir bhee ve aapase munh pher gaye tatha kah diya ki ek sikhaaya hua paagal hai.
44|15|ham door kar dene vaale hain kuchh yaatana, vaastav mein tum, phir apanee pratham sthiti par aa jaane vaale ho.
44|16|jis din ham atyant kadee pakad[1] mein le lenge. to ham nishchay badala lene vaale hain.
44|17|tatha hamane pareeksha lee inase poorv firaun kee jaati kee tatha unake paas ek aadaraneey rasool aaya.
44|18|ki mujhe saump do allaah ke bhakton ko. nishchay main tumhaare lie ek amaanatadaar rasool hoon.
44|19|tatha allaah ke vipareet ghamand na karo. main tumhaare saamane khula pramaan prastut karata hoon.
44|20|tatha mainne sharan lee hai, apane paalanahaar kee tatha tumhaare paalanahaar kee isase ki tum mujhapar patharaav kar do.
44|21|aur yadi tum mera vishvaas na karo, to mujhase pare ho jao.
44|22|antatah, moosa ne pukaara apane paalanahaar ko, ki vaastav mein ye log aparaadhee hain.
44|23|(hamane aadesh diya) ki nikal ja raaton-raat, mere bhakton ko lekar. nishchay tumhaara peechha kiya jaayega.
44|24|tatha chhod de saagar ko usakee dasha par, khula. vaastav mein, ye doob jaane vaalee sena hai.
44|25|ve chhod gaye bahut-se baag tatha jal srot.
44|26|tatha khetiyaan aur sukhadaayee sthaan.
44|27|tatha sukh ke saadhan, jinamen ve aannad le rahe the.
44|28|isee praakaar hua aur hamane unaka uttaraadhikaaree bana diya doosare[1] logon ko.
44|29|to nahin roya unapar aakaash aur na dharatee aur na unhen avasar (samay) diya gaya.
